name: The Tiny Archer
description:
The Tiny Archer is a shooter where you must shoot arrows at tailless rats and rocky bald guys.

This is a short game I made for learning.

CONTROLS:

  • arrows keys (or aswd) to move;
  • space to shoot.

TOOLS USED: Unity, Aseprite and LMMS

The art was based on Tiny RPG - Forest, from Ansimuz
